title: FS: Entire T206 McGraw Portrait w/ Cap Back Run...yet another price drop!!!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: Entire T206 McGraw Portrait w/ Cap Back Run...yet another price drop!!!
posts.post_content:
Faced with the reality that: 1) I need some cash; 2) I will never get the Uzit back, and; 3) I'd rather focus my time/money on my HOF RC Collection, I'm unloading my ENTIRE T206 McGraw Portrait w/ Cap back run.

Here's the breakdown of available cards with prices that include shipping/insurance:

1t206 Black Lenox (only 4 PSA, 2nd highest) PSA 1.5 = $SOLD!
2T215 Red Cross (only 1 higher) SGC 40 = $SOLD!
3t206 Polar Bear (highest graded) PSA 5 = $SOLD!
4t206 Cycle 460 (only 4 graded) SGC 20 = $475
5t206 Tolstoi (only 8 PSA, 3 higher) PSA 3.5 = $450
6t213-2 Coupon Cigarettes (only 2 higher)SGC 50 = $250
7t206 Old Mill (highest graded) SGC 40 = $275
8t206 Sweet Caporal 42 Overprint PSA 3 = $190
9t206 P350-460 No.25 SGC 35 = $110
10t206 Sweet Caporal 25 PSA 2 = $SOLD!
11t206 Sweet Caporal 30SGC 10 = $SOLD!

I can certainly cut a deal of some sort if you buy them all.  Some of these bad boys are either the highest graded example, or just rare back/front combos.  LMK!

Jimi

that is a jaw dropping group, and one of my favorite images in the entire set ... i might need to free up some cash on the quick, if possible ... best of luck, and very nice work!

 i will TRY to free up some cash, but if i am beaten to the finish line, no worries

i have heard that those red cross cards can be very, very tough to come by ... do you know any details about the red cross set? that is a smoking hot card
Thanks, buddy!  Feel free to throw some cash my way, my friend!  :)
The Black Lenox and two of the SCs have sold.  The rest of the prices have been dropped.

Last price drops before EvilBay takes them.  Any takers out there?

Jimi
Now on eBay for higher prices than above, however, I will still honor these prices to anyone on here who wants them.  Just shoot me a PM.  Thanks!
I went ahead and threw in another price drop.
